content: classic santa hat a knitting pattern by erin gates © lizzy knits llc 2018 he was dressed all in fur from his head to his foot and his clothes were all tarnished with ashes and soot a bundle of toys he had flung on his back and he looked like a peddler just opening his pack his eyes-how they twinkled his dimples-how merry his cheeks were like roses his nose like a cherry his droll little mouth was drawn up like a bow and the beard of his chin was as white as the snow -clement clarke moore for this pattern the instructions for each size are color coded and listed as follows baby child 10cm square in stockinette stitch unblocked © lizzy knits llc 2018 abbreviations sts- stitches co- cast on k/p- knit/purl round/rnds- rounds/rounds dpns- double pointed needles k2tog- knit two stitches together pattern using white yarn co 30 36 40 sts with us 13 9 0mm circular needles and join in the round add a stitch marker and slip the marker at the beginning of every round until you switch to dpns work k1 p1 ribbing to the end of each round for 4 5 6 rnds cut the white yarn leave a tail for weaving in at the end add red yarn and switch to us 15 circular needles knit all sts for 11 15 17 rnds switch to us 15 10 0mm dpns and continue to the instructions for the decrease rnds decrease rounds baby size only work rnds 13-43 child size only work rnds 13-44 adult size only work
